title: Bert Flugelman: public sculptor (TEFC)
creator_credit: Scott Hicks, Lesley Hammond and South Australian Film Corporation
brief_description: The work of Bert Flugelman is presented, particularly the design and casting of his famous sculpture pieces in Martin Place, Sydney, in Canberra and in Adelaide. His work in other mediums, e.g. pottery and painting is also presented, demonstrating the process of sculpture construction.
